game.name: EA SPORTS FC™ 25
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, In-App Purchases, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Stereo Sound, Remote Play Together, HDR available
game.shortDescription: EA SPORTS FC™ 25에서는 다양한 방법으로 클럽을 승리로 이끌 수 있습니다. 새로 도입된 5v5 Rush로 좋아하는 모드에서 친구들과 팀을 이루고 FC IQ가 제공하는 그 어느 때보다 뛰어난 전술 컨트롤로 클럽을 승리로 이끄세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: EA SPORTS FC™ 25 gives you more ways to win for the club. Team up with friends in your favourite modes with the new 5v5 Rush, and manage your club to victory as FC IQ delivers more tactical control than ever before.

reviewHighlights.text: This game is so badly optimised for PC its a joke.. When I first purchased this game it ran perfectly, but after an update it completed ruined this ga...
Just played this shite again today and will now be booking a lobotomy, sick to bastard death of this anal cavity of a greedy ass company taking my fuc...
